statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_location = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sustainable_materials;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM sustainable_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_location IN ('London', 'New York');
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_id > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_location='USA';
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_location='Europe' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%eco%';
SELECT * FROM fashion_professionals WHERE company_name='Ethical Fashion Co.' ORDER BY professional_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_location='USA'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM sustainable_materials WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT professional_name, company_name, email FROM fashion_professionals
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_description FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND material_description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name, price FROM materials JOIN material_supplier ON materials.material_id = material_supplier.material_id JOIN suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = material_supplier.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT m.material_name, s.supplier_name, ms.price FROM materials m JOIN material_supplier ms ON m.material_id = ms.material_id JOIN suppliers s ON s.supplier_id = ms.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_description FROM materials ORDER BY material_type DESC, material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SustainableMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM SustainableMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM SustainableMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Recycled';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM SustainableMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM SustainableMaterials ORDER BY material_type ASC;

SELECT m.material_name, s.supplier_name, mi.quantity FROM MaterialInventory mi JOIN SustainableMaterials m ON mi.material_id = m.material_id JOIN Suppliers s ON mi.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE mi.quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM MaterialInventory JOIN Suppliers ON MaterialInventory.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT professional_name, professional_title, professional_company FROM IndustryProfessionals WHERE professional_title LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT designer_name, brand_name, location, email FROM designers WHERE designer_id=1;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT designer_name, brand_name, email FROM designers ORDER BY designer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_date > '2022-01-01'
